channel.title: Automatically Sync Data Between Your Applications on Stock2Shop
channel.description: Recent content in Automatically Sync Data Between Your Applications on Stock2Shop

item.title: Shopify
item.description: Start selling today with a purpose-built and fast growing e-commerce platform that’s quick to launch and easy to use.

item.title: Magento
item.description: A powerful open-source e-commerce platform with B2B features scaled for complex data.

item.title: WooCommerce
item.description: An open-source e-commerce plug-in for WordPress that’s customisable and streamlined for retail.

item.title: B2B Trade Store
item.description: Our very own wholesale platform and shopping cart. Manage multiple price lists as well as warehouse and product data.

item.title: SAGE Business Cloud Accounting
item.description: Formerly Sage One: Simple and secure online accounting software

item.title: SAGE Business Cloud Financials
item.description: Formerly Sage Live: A new business management and accounting solution for growing enterprises.

item.title: SAGE 50Cloud Pastel Express
item.description: Formerly Sage Partner Xpress Advantage: Harness the power and productivity of a trusted desktop solution that integrate with Microsoft Office 365.

item.title: SAGE 50Cloud Pastel Partner
item.description: Formerly Sage Pastel Partner: This tried and tested accounting software includes direct bank feeds and many useful cloud features to help you boost productivity.

item.title: SAGE 100 Evolution
item.description: Formerly Sage Evolution Standard: Ideal for growing companies to manage products, orders, customers, finances and operations.

item.title: SAGE 200 Evolution
item.description: Formerly Sage Evolution Premium: Get back to basics with smart, cost-effective software for big businesses.

item.title: SAGE 300cloud
item.description: A streamlined and efficient solution for small to mid-market companies with up to several hundred users.

item.title: Sap
item.description: ERP software designed to streamline key processes and provide real-time information to give you greater strategic insights, fast.

item.title: iSync
item.description: iSync is the comprehensive ERP & PLM software solution designed specifically for the apparel industry.

item.title: SYSPRO
item.description: SYSPRO is an independent ERP provider, taking a simplified approach to ensuring success for manufacturers and distributors.

item.title: Omni Accounts
item.description: Omni Accounts is an “all-in-one” accounting system that delivers focused, effective enterprise resource planning and business solutions.

item.title: IQ Retail
item.description: IQ Retail gives you business accounting and management solutions designed to work in a retail, distributive and hospitality environment.

item.title: Microsoft Dynamics NAV
item.description: Microsoft Dynamics NAV helps SMEs and large international groups manage their accounting and finances, supply chain, and operations.

item.title: Dolfin
item.description: Dolfin Point of Sale and Merchandising presents a customisable ERP solution to meet Fashion, Apparel and General Merchandise retailer’s needs.

item.title: Parcelninja
item.description: Run your e-commerce business from anywhere with ParcelNinja’s scalable, outsourced warehousing and fulfillment solution.

item.title: Takealot
item.description: Automatically update your important product information such as pricing, stock levels and delivery lead times on the Takealot marketplace.
